page.title: 08SHOPS
page.content: There are more shops in Market Deeping than Deeping St. James. This is probably because there is a modern purpose-built shopping centre in Market Deeping which includes a large supermarket.As a result of this some of the smaller village shops in Deeping St. James have had to close down.Apart from building societies and banks the most popular shops are hair-dressers, clothes shops and newsagents.The new precinct, built in 1985, gives more variety to the shops in Market Deeping.Shops such as a florist's,cleaner's,baker's,cobbler's and a craft shop can be found in the precinct.In Deeping St.James there are two rows of shops.The one by the Primary School is a row of six shops and the other row of five shops is in Rycroft Avenue.
